official-title.#text:
Providing for further consideration of the bill (H.R. 5230) making supplemental appropriations for
			 the fiscal year ending September 30, 2014, and for other purposes;
			 providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5272) to prohibit certain
			 actions with respect to deferred action for aliens not lawfully present in
			 the United States, and for other purposes; and providing for consideration
			 of motions to suspend the rules.
